messages.subject: Reservation Deadline EXTENDED-3rd Annual UWWG (Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering)!!!
messages.msgSnippet: GREAT NEWS!!!! The Final Deadline for making reservations for the 3rd Annual Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering has been EXTENDED!!!   ·
messages.messageBody:
GREAT NEWS!!!!

The Final Deadline for making reservations for the 3rd Annual Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering has been EXTENDED!!!
 
·         The Kalahari Resort will continue taking reservations at our SUPER discounted group rate until all available rooms are filled!
 
·         So, those of you who received some extra holiday cash, you still have time to make your reservations!
 
·        Join us for a week of awesome fun, camaraderie and support among a thousand plus unschoolly / life learning / child-led / interest based homeschooling families from around the country (and Canada), at Ohio's Kalahari Resort - the largest Indoor Waterpark in the USA!  http://www.kalahariresorts.com/oh/waterparks/
 
·         NO Registration or Conference Fees!  Our super discounted room rates average to only $22 / person per night for a full kitchen, multi-room 8 or 12 man suite (other rooms also available) - and that includes your waterpark passes and participation in all our UWWG Events!  What a tremendous deal!!!
 
 
For further details on all our awesome Speakers, Funshops & Events and to register, please join our UWWG yahoo group now at: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWWG/
 
Happy Holidays and hope to see you at the 3rd Annual Unschoolers Winter Waterpark Gathering, February 8 - 12, 2010!
 
Please help us spread the word by forwarding this to all your homeschool friends and groups. - THANKS!!!!!

 ~ Carol Reinhard – UWWG Organizer
 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWWG/
http://www.ugo.unschoolgathering.com/  
 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolersGatheringofOhio-campout/
http://www.ugocampout.org/
